trans-unit.source: pyglet is a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python, intended for developing games and other visually rich applications. It supports windowing, user interface event handling, Joysticks, OpenGL graphics, loading images and videos, and playing sounds and music. pyglet works on Windows, OS X and Linux.
trans-unit.target: pyglet is a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python, intended for developing games and other visually rich applications. It supports windowing, user interface event handling, Joysticks, OpenGL graphics, loading images and videos, and playing sounds and music. pyglet works on Windows, OS X and Linux.

trans-unit.source: A good way to start contributing to a component of pyglet is by its documentation. When studying the code you are going to work with, also read the associated docs. If you don't understand the code with the help of the docs, it is a sign that the docs should be improved.
trans-unit.target: A good way to start contributing to a component of pyglet is by its documentation. When studying the code you are going to work with, also read the associated docs. If you don't understand the code with the help of the docs, it is a sign that the docs should be improved.

trans-unit.source: Load images, sound, music and video in almost any format.pyglet can optionally use FFmpeg to play back audio formats such as MP3, OGG/Vorbis and WMA, and video formats such as MPEG2, H.264, H.265, WMV and Xvid. Without FFmpeg, pyglet contains built-in support for standard formats such as wav, png, bmp, and others.
trans-unit.target: Load images, sound, music and video in almost any format.pyglet can optionally use FFmpeg to play back audio formats such as MP3, OGG/Vorbis and WMA, and video formats such as MPEG2, H.264, H.265, WMV and Xvid. Without FFmpeg, pyglet contains built-in support for standard formats such as wav, png, bmp, and others.

trans-unit.source: No external dependencies or installation requirements. For most application and game requirements, pyglet needs nothing else besides Python, simplifying distribution and installation. It's easy to package your project with freezers such as PyInstaller.
trans-unit.target: No external dependencies or installation requirements. For most application and game requirements, pyglet needs nothing else besides Python, simplifying distribution and installation. It's easy to package your project with freezers such as PyInstaller.

trans-unit.source: Please note that pyglet v1.5 will likely be the last version to support legacy OpenGL. Future releases of pyglet will be targeting OpenGL 3.3+. Previous releases will remain available for download.
trans-unit.target: Please note that pyglet v1.5 will likely be the last version to support legacy OpenGL. Future releases of pyglet will be targeting OpenGL 3.3+. Previous releases will remain available for download.

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of multiple windows and multi-monitor desktops.pyglet allows you to use multiple platform-native windows, and is fully aware of multi-monitor setups for use with fullscreen games.
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of multiple windows and multi-monitor desktops.pyglet allows you to use multiple platform-native windows, and is fully aware of multi-monitor setups for use with fullscreen games.

trans-unit.source: pyglet is provided under the BSD open-source license, allowing you to use it for both commercial and other open-source projects with very little restriction.
trans-unit.target: pyglet is provided under the BSD open-source license, allowing you to use it for both commercial and other open-source projects with very little restriction.

trans-unit.source: pyglet is written entirely in pure Python, and makes use of the ctypes module to interface with system libraries. You can modify the codebase or make a contribution without any second language compilation steps or compiler setup. Despite being pure Python, pyglet has excellent performance thanks to advanced batching for drawing thousands of objects.
trans-unit.target: pyglet is written entirely in pure Python, and makes use of the ctypes module to interface with system libraries. You can modify the codebase or make a contribution without any second language compilation steps or compiler setup. Despite being pure Python, pyglet has excellent performance thanks to advanced batching for drawing thousands of objects.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can create a patch and submit it to the issue tracker.
trans-unit.target: Или же вы можете создать патч и отправить его в трекер проблем.

trans-unit.source: Apply your changes to your fork.
trans-unit.target: Нанесите изменения на вилку.

trans-unit.source: Building Docs
trans-unit.target: Строительные документы

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an error in the documentation, either because it is hard to understand or because it doesn't match the code, is a bug that deserves to be reported on a ticket.
trans-unit.target: Следовательно,ошибка в документации,либо потому,что ее трудно понять,либо потому,что она не соответствует коду,является ошибкой,которая заслуживает того,чтобы о ней сообщили в билете.

trans-unit.target: OpenGL и GLX

trans-unit.source: Pyglet has an active developer and user community. If you find a bug or a problem with the documentation, please open an issue. Anyone is welcome to join our discord server where a lot of the development discussion is going on. It's also a great place to ask for help.
trans-unit.target: Pyglet has an active developer and user community. If you find a bug or a problem with the documentation, please open an issue. Anyone is welcome to join our discord server where a lot of the development discussion is going on. It's also a great place to ask for help.

trans-unit.source: Pyglet runs under Python 3.5+. Being written in pure Python, it also works on other Python interpreters such as PyPy. Supported platforms are:

trans-unit.target: Некоторые из особенностей пиглета:

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 1.4, to play compressed audio and video files, you will also need FFmpeg.
trans-unit.target: Starting with version 1.4, to play compressed audio and video files, you will also need FFmpeg.

trans-unit.source: Submit a pull request describing the changes you have made.
trans-unit.target: Submit a pull request describing the changes you have made.

trans-unit.source: Testing
trans-unit.target: Тестирование

trans-unit.source: There are no compilation steps during the installation; if you prefer, you can simply add this directory to your PYTHONPATH and use pyglet without installing it. You can also copy pyglet directly into your project folder.
trans-unit.target: There are no compilation steps during the installation; if you prefer, you can simply add this directory to your PYTHONPATH and use pyglet without installing it. You can also copy pyglet directly into your project folder.

trans-unit.source: When making a pull request, check that you have addressed its respective documentation, both within the code docstrings and the programming guide (if applicable). It is very important to all of us that the documentation matches the latest code and vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: При подаче запроса на подтягивание убедитесь в том,что Вы обратились к соответствующей документации,как в рамках кодовой документации,так и в руководстве по программированию (если применимо).Для всех нас очень важно,чтобы документация соответствовала последнему коду и наоборот.

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 or later
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 или более поздняя версия
